ai-patthana18.20:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma, third in the place he had allowed to,
ai-patthana18.20:0.3_0: Transmigrating for the sake of pollutants,
ai-patthana18.20:1.1_0: For one reason it’s not proper for the sake of defilement, or for teaching.
ai-patthana18.20:2.1_0: For the sake of defilement no defilements are not for those free of defilements. ...
ai-patthana18.20:2.1_2: What four trivial trees have been uneven.
ai-patthana18.20:3.1_0: (It is) for the sake of defilement or for the sake of defilement, or for the sake of defilement, or for the sake of defilement, or for the sake of defilement.
ai-patthana18.20:3.1_3: What is not the reason for two reasons.
